sentences.english: Sometimes, he gets so sulky that he just stays in his tent and fasts.
sentences.chinese: 有時候他就只會呆在自己的帳篷裏不喫東西生悶氣。

sentences.english: We set up a tent and made a bonfire.
sentences.chinese: 我們支上帳篷，生起篝火。

sentences.english: He sleeps in a tent now.
sentences.chinese: 他現在睡在一個帳篷裏。

sentences.english: A soldier took a torch and ignited one of the tents.
sentences.chinese: 一個士兵拿火把點燃了一座帳篷。

sentences.english: While the five babies were still quietly sleeping in oxygen tents in a hospital nursery.
sentences.chinese: 五個嬰兒在醫院育嬰房的氧氣帳篷裏安睡的時候。

sentences.english: The tent-shaped huts are made out of logs hammered together, which rest on floating barrels.
sentences.chinese: 那些帳篷狀的棚屋由原木捶釘而成並依靠浮筒漂浮。

sentences.english: Platform beds or canopies are better choices for smaller rooms.
sentences.chinese: 平臺式牀或帳篷是較小的房間的不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: The view from my tent only added to my happiness.
sentences.chinese: 從帳篷裏能看到的景色讓我更加快樂。

sentences.english: Seeing the tent and yak skin boat they know that the three men are in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 看見湖邊的帳篷和牛皮船知道他們有事就過來了。

sentences.english: This is an open top outrigger kayak that converts into a tent with ease.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個開放前支腿皮艇可以轉換成輕鬆帳篷。

sentences.english: When night fell, the duckling raiser would make his home in a tent-like bamboo shed.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，養鴨人便搭起一個竹帳篷當自己家了。

sentences.english: Before long, the Red Cross began to pitch tents on high ground north of town.
sentences.chinese: 不久，紅十字會開始在小鎮北面的高地上架設帳篷。

sentences.english: There are also camping areas where people put up temporary cloth homes, called tents.
sentences.chinese: 也有露營區，人們搭起臨時布院，所謂的帳篷。

sentences.english: I was very grateful for the orange glow of the fire through the canvas tent.
sentences.chinese: 我非常感激帆布帳篷裏透出的橘色燈光。

sentences.english: Next to them were tents, adorned with the medic cross.
sentences.chinese: 數個有着十字醫療標誌的帳篷在旁邊。

definition: variant of 陽臺|阳台[yang2 tai2]
to go with sb/to form companionships
to ride (in a vehicle)/to get a lift/to hitch-hike
